name: Github
description: Official GitHub MCP server for repository management. Create issues, manage pull requests, review code, search repositories, and interact with GitHub's full API directly from Claude Code.
longDescription: Official GitHub MCP server connecting via HTTP to `api.githubcopilot.com`. Exposes the GitHub API for creating and searching issues, managing pull requests, reviewing code, browsing repositories, and interacting with GitHub Actions. Requires a GitHub Personal Access Token for authentication.
